captions.text: - How's your boyfriend?
- He's great.
(upbeat music)
- So my name is Ben,

and I was together with Linda
for about a couple of months.
- I'm doing this just because
I like kinda doing weird things.
- I don't know why I'm doing this.
- I think my ex is great.
- She's great, you know.
She's really sweet.
- I'm Alex, and I was dumped hard.
- My name is Whitney, and I was with
my significant other for six months.
And I dumped him.
- So the way she broke up with me was

she said that she just
wanted to be friends.

- I feel like I need to
clear the air a little bit,

because I think I was
made out to be a villain.

- So I made this song
called Let's Just Be Friends

and put it in a music video
that I made on YouTube.
- This freaking music video about me.

- It was really cathartic,
actually, to make that video.
- That kinda rubbed me the wrong way.
But, you know, good for him.
I watched it, it's kinda catchy.
- [Linda] I'll be the little spoon.
- [Ben] Thank you.
- You're welcome!
I won't emasculate you.
- Oh, this is so wrong.
- Yeah, it's like Survivor Wednesdays.
- Oh geez.
- Should I like embrace?
Do you want to like, actually like--
- Just do it, just do it.

- I feel like we never
did this when we dated.
- Not that, yeah, you're right.
- How's your boyfriend?
- He's great.

This is gonna be awkward
to have him watch.
Sorry about this.
I don't, I'm, oh my God.
- Do you remember what we fought about,
what started that fight?
- Nope. Don't remember.
- We fought over a light bulb.
And I wanted it--
- We fought over a light bulb?

Was it the light bulb that
was hanging from my ceiling?

- No, no, it was like the blue
one outside your apartment.
And I wanted it off, and you were like,
no, I like it on.
And I was like, I feel really insecure.

And you were like, why
do you feel insecure?

And I was like, because I feel
like you don't want me here.
And you were like, you were like,
I don't want to be in a relationship.
And I was like, that's what I thought.
I would have broken up with me
if I'd been you back then.
- Are you still ticklish?
- Yeah, don't--
- I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
- Was I a rebound?
- Yeah, most definitely.
But I rebounded after you,
and that was like a shit show.

- I am a lot to handle,
and you couldn't handle it.
I'm sorry.
- Did you regret breaking up with me?
- For a little bit, yeah, I did.
I felt like I had let a good thing go.
- A compliment for this lovely gentleman.

He makes me laugh very
hard, and it's very nice.
- I remember I didn't like the sweater
you wore on our second date,
but I was like, whatever, it's okay.
And then like you--
- Was it the blue one with the collar?
I love that sweater.
- You're very unique,

and I have not met too
many people like you.
- It just looked kind of like pretentious.
- Oh.
- (laughs) This feels so good to say, Ben.

- [Ben] See you!
- This feels so good!
I hate that sweater.
- I'm sort of sorry...
that it went down the way it did,

but I'm glad you got success
from your music video.

- And you know what,
we wouldn't have found
two new people that we're like happy with.
- Exactly, exactly.
- And that's nice.
- Some things aren't just meant to be.

- Yeah, you know, it wasn't as
bad as I thought it would be.
It was, it was kinda nice.
It felt good to reconnect.

- Yeah, it was not as
bad as I anticipated.
- [Linda] Yeah.
- Didn't hurt.
- That was fun.
It was fine. It's not that weird.
- High five.
- There you go, high five.
That's nice.
See, we can high five now.

- Mm-hmm, we couldn't
do that two years ago.

- You do some cuddling, you
get a high five out of it,
who doesn't love a high five.

Am I right?
- Sure.
- Yeah.
- Okay.
Yeah, that was two in a row.
- Why not? What's wrong with that?
- It's awkward!
- Why, it's just a high five?
- We're good.
See, we're fine.
- [Alex] Cuddle.
- [Whitney] But be careful.
Cuddle with protection.
- Use condoms.
- I'm not saying have sex with your exes.

title: Exes Cuddle Again For The First Time In Years

comments.author: michael cochrane

comments.text:
Just to shed light about the song, it doesn't mention anything about her or 
one girl. It is basically him going up to different girls wanting to take 
them out and all of them saying they just want to be friends. So, if you 
were to listen to the song without any prior knowledge to this, as I did, 
you would just think that most of the girls he wanted to date just wanted 
to be friends. So there was no real exploitation of the relationship, 
though I do understand her being a bit miffed about it, she didn't need to 
act the way she did in this video. It looked liked he was ready to make 
amends and she was still holding some sort of a grudge.The other couple 
looked so comfortable around each other though, so good on them :D﻿
